lines.text: Scwatching, scwatching, scwatching! One more scwatch, and I'll give you a bath.
No, no, no, no, no! No, please, no!
[the flea has detonated some explosive on the dog's rump; he is frantically dragging his butt on the floor]

[Stops suddenly]
Hey, I better cut this out. I may get to like it.

[singing]
There is food around the corner, food around the corner, food around the corner for me - Hallelujah, brother! - food around the corner, food around the corner, food around the corner for me.
